content.description: Cat walk around the right of some chest high boulders and the climb is on your immediate left.  Belay is from on top of the boulder against the wall.
content.protection: Standard Rack of 12 quick draws, expect a two bolt traditional anchor with chains or rap rings.
content.location: Cat walk around the right of some chest high boulders and the climb is on your immediate left.  See topo picture for approximate location

content.description: Start up the right leaning ramp with sharp pocketed features and follow bolts to the top.
content.protection: Standard rack of 12 quick draws, expect a two bolt traditional anchor with chains or rap rings.
content.location: See Warrior Wall topo for approximate location.

content.description: Bolt line just to the right of the boulder against the wall.
content.protection: Standard rack of 12 quick draws, expect two bolt traditional anchor with chains or rap rings.
content.location: See Warrior Wall right topo for approximate location.

content.description: This area classic is the most striking arete on the ranch.  Sharp pockets down low lead to a power endurance pump fest that leaves you feeling exposed and airy!
content.protection: Standard rack of 12 quick draws with a two bolt anchor with chains
content.location: The obvious arete right of the giant cave in the middle of the wall.

content.description: Climb the obvious crack corner through.  Watch for loose rock and those below you.
content.protection: Climbed as TR, not sure how good the gear is.
content.location: See topo picture for approximate location.

content.description: Unclimbed in a decade. Not Verified.
content.protection: Standard rack of 12 quick draws and expect a two bolt traditional anchor with chains or rap rings.
content.location: See picture topo for approximate location.

content.description: Climbs the bolt line that leads to the left side of the massive cave halfway up the wall.
content.protection: Standard rack of 12 quick draws and expect a two bolt anchor with chains or rap rings.

content.description: Great technical route for the grade! scramble in front of the shade rock at the base of Tomahawk and belay from a flat boulder.
content.protection: Standard rack of 12 quick draws, two bolt anchor with chains
Standard rack of 12 quick draws and expect bolted traditional anchors with chains or rap rings.
content.location: See topo in pictures for approximate location.  Not verified.

content.description: Just past Wire Wall, but before The Arch.  The wall starts with the popular and most obvious arete in the area Tomahawk 5.11-  and extends through the brushy boulder field down to Lost Arrow
